import sys

for __ in range(input()) :
    n = input()
    if n==1 :
        print 1
        continue
    k = n
    os , es = n/2 if not n&1 else (n/2)+1 , 0
    n = n/2 
    es = 2*(n*(n+1)/2)
    if k&1 :
        n += 1
        os += 2*(n*(n-1)/2)
    else :
        os += 2*(n*(n-1)/2)
    print os-es
